column6:
"DECALOGUE" ,2005,6
The secrets of Matt Murdock's clandestine marriage to Milla are revealed at last! The details of Daredevil's year as Kingpin continues in this special love story. Part 4 (of 5).
32 PGS./T+ Suggested for Teens and Up ...$2.99
Retailer Alert: This bold, new look will showcase the monthly Daredevil title for the length of the "Decalogue" storyarc.
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller (cover):Alex Maleev | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Dave Stewart
